meanings.definition: Not separated or divided into parts.
meanings.sent1: The unseparated cake was too big to fit in the oven.
meanings.sent2: The unseparated rope was too tangled to unravel easily.
meanings.sent3: The unseparated puzzle pieces made it impossible to complete the picture.
meanings.sent4: The unseparated clouds covered the entire sky like a thick blanket.
meanings.sent5: The unseparated group of friends always did everything together.

meanings.definition: Not having been separated or divided.
meanings.sent1: The unseparated twins always dressed alike.
meanings.sent2: The unseparated documents were found in a dusty old box.
meanings.sent3: The unseparated socks kept disappearing in the laundry.
meanings.sent4: The unseparated memories flooded back all at once.
meanings.sent5: The unseparated team won every game they played.
